Welcome to Zeek Documentation by Laiba Waseem!

This documentation is designed to provide comprehensive knowledge about Zeek, including its implementation, installation, interpretation of default logs, and customization to fit specific needs. It is tailored for the NCCS-NED lab to ensure a thorough understanding of Zeek’s capabilities and usage.
